title: Foundations of Digital Archive-Integrated E-Learning Design for Large-Scale Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Internet Utilization Experience
context.additional_context: Learning digital archive standards and metadata utilization in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with competency development through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic components and metadata systems of digital archives.
Learners can perform procedures to classify and register digital archive materials in a simulation environment using mobile devices.
Learners can complete a collaborative project sharing digital archive construction case studies with peer learners using VR-based collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
